description: Steve Cooper still wants Dean Henderson despite Matt Turner move
title: Steve Cooper still wants Dean Henderson despite Matt Turner move
title_page: Steve Cooper still wants Dean Henderson despite Matt Turner move - BBC Sport
maintext:
Simon Stone, BBC Sport
Arsenal's Matt Turner will have a medical at Nottingham Forest later today.
It is understood the move for Turner will not have any impact on Forest's attempt to sign Manchester United's Dean Henderson, who manager Steve Cooper is keen to bring back to the City Ground.
